The rates listed are for either "East of the Mississippi" or "West of the Mississippi" and include insurance coverage. Your actual costs can be viewed by clicking on "View Shipping Charges" in your cart. Bikes, Trainers, Wheels and other overweight items are billed at higher rates.

For International Shipping please call 1-631-673-2211 , e-mail us at: info@bicyclebuys.com
or
click here for approximate shipping costs based on past shipments to your country.

International orders are not billed at time of order. You will be contacted in advance with the most economical quotes we can find. For overseas shipments we use Federal Express and US Mail. The most economical rates will be quoted. For approximate International rates click here: Estimated International Shipping

You will be notified before shipping of any changes and your approval.

Note: We are located in New York State. Most states east of the Mississippi are within 3 days delivery time of the FEDEX System. States west of the Mississippi are 4- 6 days delivery time. FEDEX delivers next day to most regions of the continental US. Some remote regions might not have next day available. In which case 2 Day service will still be billed at the Next Day Rate. We cannot be responsible for delivery delays by these carriers. Delivery times can be subject to weather and other factors not in their control.

Note: Oversized and overweight parcels may have a higher freight charge. You will be notified in advance of any change to the freight cost.

Note: Freight to Alaska and Hawaii have different rates. We will use US Mail, FEDEX Air service. FEDEX does not offer ground service to these locations.

Free Shipping Note: Free Shipping applies only to items specifically stated or as calculated at checkout. Free Shipping applies to continental US only. Heavy weight items excluded unless otherwise stated.
